items.name: Helm of Wisdom
items.description: A shining helmet that enhances mental acuity.

items.name: Pauldrons of Might
items.description: Massive shoulder armor that grants incredible strength.

items.name: Amulet of Vitality
items.description: A glowing pendant that enhances life force.

items.name: Gauntlets of Dexterity
items.description: Finely crafted gloves that improve hand-eye coordination.

items.name: Chestplate of Resilience
items.description: A sturdy breastplate that greatly increases defense.

items.name: Belt of Giant Strength
items.description: A wide belt that grants the wearer tremendous strength.

items.name: Greaves of Swiftness
items.description: Leg armor that increases movement speed.

items.name: Boots of Levitation
items.description: Magical boots that allow the wearer to float slightly above the ground.

items.name: Sword of Flames
items.description: A blazing sword that deals fire damage.

items.name: Quiver of Infinite Arrows
items.description: A magical quiver that never runs out of arrows.
